'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* You can access other parts of the area through the flooded hallway. Survival 4 allows you to orient yourself in the tunnels.
** Follow the hall left leading to the [[cannon rampart]]'s inaccessible part, requiring Might 14 or a [[Prybar (Deadfire)|prybar]] to open the door.
** Going right leads to the [[dining hall]], but requires Athletics 8 checks on your entire party in order to pass through the debris, causing [[Fatigue]] on the character who failed by the most points (-5 Accuracy, -10 All Defenses, -15% Max Health).
